name: Line Shatter
description:
GAMEPLAY

  • CLICK TO CHANGE SIDE
  • AIM FOR THE SEGMENTS IN TRIANGLE'S COLOR
  • AVOID RED SEGMENTS

LEADERBOARD IS ONLY AVAILABLE ON PC!

YOU HAVE TO MANUALLY UPLOAD YOUR SCORE EVERY TIME!

I am using free service to host leaderboard so I want to be caucious about requests (-:

Another game made as an exercise during quarantine. This time it's also a clone of a game I once played but can't find its name now. If you recognize this game please let me know in the comments so I can link to.

Code available at https://github.com/dziemo/LineShatter2D
